comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Count_Zeppelin Ferdinand Adolf Heinrich August Graf von Zeppelin[1] (also known as Ferdinand Graf von Zeppelin, Graf Zeppelin and in English, Count Zeppelin) (8 July 1838 – 8 March 1917) was a German general and later aircraft manufacturer, the founder of the Zeppelin Airship company. He was born in Konstanz, Grand Duchy of Baden (now part of Baden-Württemberg, Germany).

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A biography with pictures is at: www.uni-konstanz.de/FuF/Philo/Geschichte/Zeppelin/english...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The word HAMBURG is the lower part of the embossed identification of a photographer.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton and swanq:  Thank you for the information and picutres in the biography which confirm that this is Ferdinand Graf von Zeppelin.  We will add a fuller form of this name and more information to the description when we update.
